pullrequest.title: issue #194, increase upper limit of joint damping coefficient settings.  pass through kp_velocity to implicit joint damping.

content.raw: What is the reasoning behind limiting how much we can change CFM damping? I still want the D of PID to be done with CFM damping, and be done on each tick with no limits.
content.html: What is the reasoning behind limiting how much we can change CFM damping? I still want the D of PID to be done with CFM damping, and be done on each tick with no limits.
